alert.note: Alert for Broome; Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 11:24AM EDT until July 24 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Broome County in central New York... West central Delaware County in central New York... Northeastern Susquehanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Northwestern Wayne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until noon EDT. * At 1122 AM EDT, multiple severe thunderstorms were located in Susquehanna county near Susquehanna Depot, or 13 miles southwest of Deposit, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. At 1020 AM downed trees and wires were reported in Jackson Township and also near Montrose. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sanford, Susquehanna, Deposit, Susquehanna Depot, Hallstead, Windsor, New Milford, Great Bend, Lanesboro and Sherman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
